role.argrole: entity arg0 has fresh memory of

example.parse: (IP (NP-TPC (DP (DT 每) (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 件)))) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 细微))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 事))) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 都)) (VP (VV 记忆犹新))))
